New Records: Yordan Alvarez hit three home runs, tying a franchise record for most HRs in a single game by a player (previously set by Lance Berkman in 2006).
Spencer Arrighetti became the first Astros pitcher to carry a no-hitter into the 8th inning in his MLB debut since Carlos Alcorta in 1986.
Key Match Events: The Astros' 10-0 victory was their largest margin of victory in the 2024 season up to that point.
Yordan Alvarez became the first Astros player to hit three home runs in a single game since Carlos Lee in 2007.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros won the series 2-1 against the Phillies, taking two consecutive games after losing the first.
The game was played at Citizens Bank Park in front of 37,778 fans.
